name: JobTrac Clipper
description: Save jobs, contacts, and notes from anywhere on the web directly to your JobTrac account.

offscreen.justification: To handle Firebase authentication in a secure context.

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self' https://apis.google.com https://www.gstatic.com/ https://www.googleapis.com https://securetoken.googleapis.com; object-src 'self'; frame-src 'self' https://jobtrac-2dded.firebaseapp.com; connect-src 'self' https://*.firebaseio.com https://www.googleapis.com https://securetoken.googleapis.com;
